# cds-toast



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                        | Type                                         | Default |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `animateIn`    | `animate-in`     | Toast in animation                 | `string`                                     | `''`    |
| `animateOut`   | `animate-out`    | Toast out animation                | `string`                                     | `''`    |
| `duration`     | `duration`       | Duration before toast is removed   | `number`                                     | `5000`  |
| `pauseOnHover` | `pause-on-hover` | Pause toast removal while hovered? | `boolean`                                    | `false` |
| `position`     | `position`       | Position of toast notifications    | `"b" \| "bl" \| "br" \| "t" \| "tl" \| "tr"` | `'br'`  |
